itunes:title: Children Hurting Themselves When They're Upset
title: Children Hurting Themselves When They're Upset
itunes:author: JLML Press
itunes:subtitle: Janet answers a question from a parent whose todd…
itunes:summary:
Janet answers a question from a parent whose toddler resorts to hurting himself when he’s angry or frustrated, and she’s wondering if there are some “better options” to teach him when he’s expressing his emotions.

For more advice on common infant/toddler parenting issues, please check out Janet's books at Amazon and Audible. Also available for download, her audio series "Sessions" -- recorded consultations with parents discussing their most immediate and pressing concerns (SessionsAudio.com).
